thread.title: Yakutia Air: Summer Air Service to Japan & Russia
thread.title_full: Yakutia Air: Summer Air Service to Japan & Russia

author: wtcak.org (info@www.akbizmag.com)
title: Yakutia Air: Summer Air Service to Japan & Russia
text: Yakutia Air: Summer Air Service to Japan & Russia Summer air service to Russia and Japan now operating. wtcak.org Dear Members & Friends of World Trade Center Anchorage: We are pleased to forward an announcement from our member Yakutia Airlines (AirRussia.US) . About AirRussia.US AirRussia.US is a travel portal created to facilitate and promote travel between North America and Eastern Russia. InterPacific Aviation and Marketing, Inc. (IPAM) based in Seattle, Washington is a sole owner of AirRussia.US and is the designated representative for Yakutia Airlines in the United States. IPAM is further dedicated to expanding the range of travel options for leisure and business travelers who need to get to Eastern Russia from North America through their growing alliance of airlines and travel agents. For more information visit www.airrussia.us or call (206) 443-1614.
